title: Dan Patrick - Hour 3 – NBA Insider Ric Bucher
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 3 – NBA Insider Ric Bucher
description:
In hour 3 of the Dan Patrick Show, Jason Smith and Mike Harmon touch on the ‘Secrets of Dumbledore’ film and how the franchise has essentially ditched what it was built on. The guys circle back to the NBA and Kyrie Irving’s rematch with Boston’s fans, and discuss if the Nets can still win the series. Plus, NBA Insider Ric Bucher joins the show to share some insight on Kyrie Irving’s hostile weekend, the probability that Phoenix can win it all, and more!

#jss

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
